questions.question: Specific gravity of manometer liquid is

answers.a: Angle between vertical axis of pitot tube and direction of air current
answers.b: Angle between horizontal axis of pitot tube and direction of air current
answers.c: Angle between horizontal and vertical axis of pitot tube

questions.question: Lower is the angle of yaw

answers.a: Lower is the accuracy of pitot tube
answers.b: No effect on accuracy of pitot tube
answers.c: Higher is the accuracy of pitot tube

questions.question: If inclination of manometer is constant, L is scale difference between limb of manometer and P is pressure measured, then which one is correct?

answers.a: P is directly proportional to L
answers.b: P is inversely proportional to L
answers.c: P is directly proportional to L<sup>2</sup>
answers.d: P is inversely proportional to L<sup>3</sup>

questions.question: If density of air is assumed to be constant, Pv is the velocity pressure and V is the velocity of air. Which one of the given relationship is correct?
